butterfree.core.load package¶

Subpackages¶

  • butterfree.core.load.writers package
    • Submodules
    • Module contents

Submodules¶

Holds the Sink class.

class butterfree.core.load.sink.Sink(writers: List[butterfree.core.load.writers.writer.Writer])¶

Bases: object

Define the destinations for the feature set pipeline.

A Sink is created from a set of writers. The main goal of the Sink is to trigger the load in each defined writers. After the load the entity can be used to make sure that all data was written properly using the validate method.

writers¶

list of writers to run.

flush(feature_set: butterfree.core.transform.feature_set.FeatureSet, dataframe: pyspark.sql.dataframe.DataFrame, spark_client: butterfree.core.clients.spark_client.SparkClient)¶

Trigger a write job in all the defined Writers.

Parameters

  • dataframe – spark dataframe containing data from a feature set.

  • feature_set – object processed with feature set metadata.

  • spark_client – client used to run a query.

validate(feature_set: butterfree.core.transform.feature_set.FeatureSet, dataframe: pyspark.sql.dataframe.DataFrame, spark_client: butterfree.core.clients.spark_client.SparkClient)¶

Trigger a validation job in all the defined Writers.

Parameters

  • dataframe – spark dataframe containing data from a feature set.

  • feature_set – object processed with feature set metadata.

  • spark_client – client used to run a query.

Raises

RuntimeError – if any on the Writers returns a failed validation.

Module contents¶

Holds the Sink component of a feature set pipeline.

class butterfree.core.load.Sink(writers: List[butterfree.core.load.writers.writer.Writer])¶

Bases: object

Define the destinations for the feature set pipeline.

A Sink is created from a set of writers. The main goal of the Sink is to trigger the load in each defined writers. After the load the entity can be used to make sure that all data was written properly using the validate method.

writers¶

list of writers to run.

flush(feature_set: butterfree.core.transform.feature_set.FeatureSet, dataframe: pyspark.sql.dataframe.DataFrame, spark_client: butterfree.core.clients.spark_client.SparkClient)¶

Trigger a write job in all the defined Writers.

Parameters

  • dataframe – spark dataframe containing data from a feature set.

  • feature_set – object processed with feature set metadata.

  • spark_client – client used to run a query.

validate(feature_set: butterfree.core.transform.feature_set.FeatureSet, dataframe: pyspark.sql.dataframe.DataFrame, spark_client: butterfree.core.clients.spark_client.SparkClient)¶

Trigger a validation job in all the defined Writers.

Parameters

  • dataframe – spark dataframe containing data from a feature set.

  • feature_set – object processed with feature set metadata.

  • spark_client – client used to run a query.

Raises

RuntimeError – if any on the Writers returns a failed validation.
